AVRException¶

exception avrexcep.AVRException[source]¶

Base class for other exceptions

exception avrexcep.BreakException[source]¶

Raised when instruction BRK is executed

exception avrexcep.OutOfMemError[source]¶

Raised when denotes an acces to an inexistent adress

exception avrexcep.UnknownCodeError[source]¶

Raises when given instruction is unknown
